item.author: serendipity@perrotta.dev (Thiago Perrotta)
item.description:
Yesterday I discovered a little feature from Wordpress. Head to http://wordpress.com/following/edit, so you can use Wordpress as a feed reader. (A.K.A.: google reader, I still miss you!) You should notice this feed works better for Wordpress feeds. For non-Wordpress ones, I like commafeed.
